data.trans: Ăn mòn, tiêu mất một phần
data.trans_hint: Kỳ nghỉ đã đã tiêu mất một phần tiền tiết kiệm của chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: Our holiday has eaten into our savings.
data.content_game_1: Our holiday has eaten into our savings.
data.answer_en_hint: Our holiday has eaten into our savings.

data.trans: (+sth) Sống sót bằng (thức ăn, số tiền)
data.trans_hint: Họ cảm thấy khó có thể sống bằng lương hưu của nhà nước.
data.en_hint: They find it hard to live on their state pension.
data.content_game_1: They find it hard to live on their state pension.
data.answer_en_hint: They find it hard to live on their state pension.

data.trans: Xoay sở sống (với số tiền ít ỏi)
data.trans_hint: Tôi chỉ có thể xoay sở sống bằng những gì ông bà cho tôi.
data.en_hint: I can just scrape by on what my grandparents give me.
data.content_game_1: I can just scrape by on what my grandparents give me.
data.answer_en_hint: I can just scrape by on what my grandparents give me.

data.trans_hint: Ý tưởng đi du lịch vào dịp mỗi năm giờ hoàn toàn ngoài khả năng với gia đình anh ta vì họ đang phải gánh một khoản nợ khổng lồ.
data.en_hint: The idea of traveling several times each year is out of the question to his family now as they are dealing with a huge debt.
data.content_game_1: The idea of traveling several times each year is out of the question to his family now as they are dealing with a huge debt.
data.answer_en_hint: The idea of traveling several times each year is out of the question to his family now as they are dealing with a huge debt.

data.trans_hint: Tôi phải cắt giảm chi tiêu cá nhân từ tháng này vì lương đã bị giảm.
data.en_hint: I have to cut back on personal expenses from this month on because of a pay cut.
data.content_game_1: I have to cut back on personal expenses from this month on because of a pay cut.
data.answer_en_hint: I have to cut back on personal expenses from this month on because of a pay cut.

data.trans_hint: Giá xăng thời điểm đó đột nhiên tăng vọt, khiến bao người lao động nghèo lo lắng.
data.en_hint: The price of gas suddenly went through the roof at that time, causing lots of poor laborers to be worried.
data.content_game_1: The price of gas suddenly went through the roof at that time, causing lots of poor laborers to be worried.
data.answer_en_hint: The price of gas suddenly went through the roof at that time, causing lots of poor laborers to be worried.

data.trans_hint: Là một công nhân xây dựng bình thường, cậu ấy cũng chỉ kiếm đủ sống mỗi ngày thôi.
data.en_hint: As an ordinary construction worker, he just makes ends meet on a regular basis.
data.content_game_1: As an ordinary construction worker, he just makes ends meet on a regular basis.
data.answer_en_hint: As an ordinary construction worker, he just makes ends meet on a regular basis.

data.trans_hint: Những người lao động trình độ thấp sống lay lắt qua ngày đã gặp vô vàn khó khăn để chống chọi qua giai đoạn khủng hoảng kinh tế khi đó.
data.en_hint: Low-qualified workers on the breadline had a hard time surviving through that economic crisis back then.
data.content_game_1: Low-qualified workers on the breadline had a hard time surviving through that economic crisis back then.
data.answer_en_hint: Low-qualified workers on the breadline had a hard time surviving through that economic crisis back then.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi đã phải dùng hết số tiền tiết kiệm của bản thân để cho tôi học đại học.
data.en_hint: My mother had to use her saving up for me to go to university.
data.content_game_1: My mother had to use her saving up for me to go to university.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother had to use her saving up for me to go to university.
